mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.title, s.sort_id as sortId, so.name as sortName, s.province, s.city, s.district, s.venue_name as venueName, s.detail_address as detailAddress, s.full_address as fullAddress, s.image, MIN(CASE WHEN sess.price IS NOT NULL AND sess.price > 0 THEN sess.price END) as price, COALESCE(SUM(sess.stock), 0) as stock, COALESCE(SUM(sess.total_stock), 0) as totalStock FROM `show` s LEFT JOIN sessions sess ON s.id = sess.show_id LEFT JOIN `sort` so ON s.sort_id = so.id WHERE s.id = #{id} GROUP BY s.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `show` ( title, sort_id, province, city, district, venue_name, detail_address, full_address, image ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{sortId}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{venueName}, #{detailAddress}, #{fullAddress}, #{image} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE `show`
title = #{title},
sort_id = #{sortId},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
district = #{district},
venue_name = #{venueName},
detail_address = #{detailAddress},
full_address = #{fullAddress},
image = #{image},
WHERE id = #{id}
